name: 陳盛有
objective:
1.電路元件
2.電路特性
3.網路方程式
4.穩態分析及頻率響應
5.網路函數：極點及零點
6.雙埠網路分析
7.傅利葉及拉普拉斯轉換
schedule:
1.Network Equations  
2.Loop Variable Analysis   
3.Node Variable Analysis  
4.First-Order Circuits 
5.Impulse Response    
6.Initial Conditions in Network   
7.The Laplace Transformation  
8.Transform of Other Signal Waveforms  
9.Midterm Exam.   
10.Network Theorems   
11.Network Functions   
12.Two-Port Parameters   
13.Sinusoidal Steady-State Analysis   
14.Frequency Response Plots   
15.Power Transfer,Insertion Loss   
16.Fourier Series and Signal Spectra   
17.Fourier Integral and Continuous Spectra  
18.Final Exam.
